channel.title: Stuck between 2 traffic cones in DM_subtransit
channel.description:
First of all, congratulations for the Steam release and thank you a lot for bringing it there. I'm enjoying the game quite a lot. The MP maps are VERY good. I'm surprised. I love them. Specially Gas Works.
Ok, to the "bug" report. I was playing Substransit and I was in the train. Then. I jumped (tried to) over the guard rail at the right where the cones are and got stuck there.
Info: Status: map : dm_subtransit at: 596 x, 1064 y, 362 z players : 1 humans, 0 bots (32 max) edicts : 1013 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "SkyNET" [U:1] 07:54 16 0 active loopback
Getpos setpos 596.245178 1064.130249 362.031250;setang 69.067909 115.773178 0.000000
![2015-05-05_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://f8EXPjuB9pAPYPA3bsnnYQW9CFS.jpeg)
Now, I don't know if I'm stuck because of the physics or what, but, the cones didn't move at all meaning that maybe physics weren't enabled in the server I was playing (Unlikely, I know. SV was "Team Deathmatch NY2")
Again, congratulations and thank you for this masterpiece!

item.title: Stuck between 2 traffic cones in DM_subtransit
item.dc:creator: SkyNET
item.description:
First of all, congratulations for the Steam release and thank you a lot for bringing it there.
I’m enjoying the game quite a lot.
The MP maps are VERY good. I’m surprised. I love them.
Specially Gas Works.

Ok, to the “bug” report.
I was playing Substransit and I was in the train.
Then. I jumped (tried to) over the guard rail at the right where the cones are and got stuck there.

Info:
Status:
map : dm_subtransit at: 596 x, 1064 y, 362 z
players : 1 humans, 0 bots (32 max)
edicts : 1013 used of 2048 max

userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr

3 “SkyNET” [U:1] 07:54 16 0 active loopback

Getpos
setpos 596.245178 1064.130249 362.031250;setang 69.067909 115.773178 0.000000

2015-05-05_00002.jpg1920×1080 187 KB

Now, I don’t know if I’m stuck because of the physics or what, but, the cones didn’t move at all meaning that maybe physics weren’t enabled in the server I was playing (Unlikely, I know. SV was “Team Deathmatch NY2”)

Again, congratulations and thank you for this masterpiece!
